sub_title: Head of Marketing | Marketing communications, content and digital experience
summary:
Lorraine is a global marketing leader with 18 years experience in brand building and improving digital customer experience to drive value for customers and organization spanning APAC, US/Canada, and Europe.

Expertise:
- Team management in a global setting
- Omnichannel marketing 
- Digital marketing & insights, eCommerce
- Business growth in digital space

Personal strengths:
- Senior leader who inspires trust and teamwork
- Creative thinking to deliver cost-effective solutions and identify opportunities
- Strong business acumen, entrepreneurial and results-oriented

school.name: M.A.D. School by Chatsworth Medi@rt Academy

awards.title: 2016 Frost & Sullivan Global Competitive Strategy Leadership Award in Health and Wellness
awards.description:
HealthHub has positioned itself as a one-stop website for health-related happenings and events
for residents through its offerings of information pertaining to restaurant and shopping
deals, health and exercise events to health campaigns currently organized by the various health
agencies in Singapore. 

For instance, the launch of HealthHub was tied to Health Promotion Board's National Steps Challenge campaign where free step trackers were given to participants. A widely popular campaign which has attracted over 35,000 Singaporeans, has generated much
buzz and enthusiasm for HealthHub as well. 

In addition, HealthHub incorporates localized
language i.e. Singlish into its lifestyle articles, to further appeal and engage local readers.

awards.title: 2016 Frost & Sullivan Global Enabling Technology Leadership Award in Healthcare Platform
awards.description:
The Enabling Technology Leadership award in Healthcare platform is conferred on the best
performing vendor globally. The contenders of this award were evaluated based on the following key
criteria:
• Ease of Navigation
• Access Platforms
• Quality of Interface
• Security and Privacy
• System Stability

HealthHub has performed well for a portal that is less than a year old, with scores showing high user experience. This reflects great potential for HealthHub to grow and mature as a top-of-mind destination for Singaporeans to obtain their health information.

awards.title: 2016 Frost & Sullivan Global Visionary Innovation Leadership Award in Healthcare Services
awards.description:
HealthHub, a relatively new portal on the digital health scene, aims to aggregate content and services to influence health behavior and simplify interaction with health service providers on the same platform.

HealthHub is coming up as a strong contender in the digital health portal space, with a variety of new services and upgrades introduced quarterly. 

With regular focus group discussions and reviews held by HealthHub on portal offerings and improvement areas, there is huge potential for HealthHub to develop itself as a market leader in the digital health sphere in the next few years.

awards.title: Best App - Community Service
awards.description:
HealthHub, by Health Promotion Board, was announced the Bronze winner, Best App - Community Service at the fourth edition of Mob-Ex Awards 2016.

This award recognises the best mobile application aimed at aiding and improving the lives of the local community or advocating for a public cause or initiative. The app could be focused on information related to transportation, the environment, charitable causes, entertainment and culture, education and more.

awards.title: Best App - Government
awards.description:
HealthHub, by Health Promotion Board, was announced the Gold winner, Best App - Government at the fourth edition of Mob-Ex Awards 2016.

This award recognises the best mobile application designed to help improve communication, information flow and access to data for any government-owned app that provides utility or information regarding the economy, commerce and industry, employment, the environment, social welfare, education, infrastructural development, culture and recreation, infrastructure development or government services.

awards.title: Best Campaign - Use of Multiple Mobile Channels
awards.description:
HealthHub, by Health Promotion Board, was announced the Bronze winner for Best Campaign - Use of Multiple Mobile Channels at the fourth edition of Mob-Ex Awards 2016.

This award recognises the best campaign that showcases integration between mobile platforms, channels, and technologies (e.g. apps, mobile web, video, display, search) while delivering unprecedented results in creativity and effectiveness.

awards.title: Best App/Content by Government/Community
awards.description: Project lead for the National Healthy Lifestyle Campaign 2014 which was a finalist, Best App/Content by Government/Community at the MOB-EX Awards 2015

awards.title: Best use of QR codes
awards.description: Health Promotion Board won the Silver Award at the Mob-Ex Awards 2015 for the National Healthy Lifestyle Campaign 2014.

profile_positions.description:
Accel Club is a global tech-powered consumer goods platform with a focus on acquiring and optimizing Amazon FBA brands. With an in-house team of experts in operations, supply chain, marketing, and product design, the Netherlands start-up has garnered over $170M in funding to further expand globally.

- Head of Department for brand marketing & communication (Corporate, B2C)
- Contributed to a $26M revenue business through building in-house marcom expertise, and standards in branding & communications, and digital customer experience 
- Led two teams in consumer-facing communication on Amazon and social media marketing for different brands ranging from art & craft, and household products to pet supplies
- Spearheaded corporate communication and managed public and media relations for the two founders and Accel Club, e.g. secured a live telecast media interview with Sky News, a speaker opportunity at Web Summit, 3X growth on company's Linkedin
profile_positions.title: Head of Marketing

profile_positions.description:
Dyneema®, an ultra-high molecular weight polyethylene, is the world's strongest fiber™ protecting the lives of millions of people and the environment they live in, with an annual revenue of over €300M (per Annual Report 2020). 

- Department head and custodian of Dyneema® brand. Oversees global brand strategy and management. 
- Lead the team in global marketing communication campaigns and programs to elevate brand value and digital user experience 
- Drove tactical marketing campaigns for business segments 
- Spearheaded leads nurturing program and leads generation initiatives to build the pipeline
- Guided the team in content strategy, social media strategy to drive engagement and growth on social media platforms
profile_positions.title: Department head | Global Marketing Communications Manager, Dyneema®

profile_positions.description:
Tupperware Brands is a leading global manufacturer and marketer of innovative premium products through social selling. Its product brands span several categories including design-centric food
preparation, storage and serving solutions for the kitchen and home as well as beauty and personal care products. In 2019, it achieved over USD 1.79 billion in annual revenue.

- Led and implemented digital initiatives and eCommerce platform for Tupperware United States and Canada (TW US/CA) while supporting the global strategy under the direction of Global VP Digital Transformation
- Oversaw eCommerce website in the area of content creation and management, online promotions, merchandising opportunities and identify process improvements to increase throughput and higher efficiencies and conversion. Contributed to the 2-fold increase in key business metrics namely conversion rate, revenue and number of transactions year-on-year (2019 vs 2020)
- Developed digital branding guidelines with content strategist for digital platforms
- Analyzed business requirements for the website and managed external vendor in delivering the enhancements.
- Drove digital advertising strategy with media agency, product marketing department and creatives to develop a product mix to attract new customers via multiple online channels (Google Display, SEM, Social Media, Amazon) and drive incremental revenue.
profile_positions.title: eCommerce lead & Global Digital Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Tupperware Brands is a global manufacturer and marketer of innovative premium products through social selling. Its product brands span several categories including design-centric food
preparation, storage and serving solutions for the kitchen and home as well as beauty and personal care products. In 2019, it achieved over USD 1.79 billion in annual revenue.

- Digital lead for Asia Pacific (includes Australia, China, India, Indonesia, Japan, Malaysia, New Zealand, Philippines, South Korea, Singapore). 
- Developed road map to accelerate digital transformation, elevate online presence through improved content marketing and optimize digital media across multi-channel platforms
- Identified trends and guided the markets in implementing best practices with a focus on delivering analytical insights
- Analysed and reported key metrics/performance to senior management
- Led and implemented global and regional projects, i.e. data warehouse, marketing automation and mobile apps development
profile_positions.title: Regional lead | Digital Marketing Manager, APAC

profile_positions.description:
HPB is a statutory board under the Ministry of Health Singapore. It is committed to promoting healthy living in Singapore and it is guided by evidence-based health knowledge to formulate and implement health policies and programs that improve the residents’ health.

- Department head
- Developed digital strategy and roadmap to enhance digital capabilities with frameworks for corporate governance
- Champion content strategy and optimized social media platforms and websites, social listening, search, SEM and online-to-offline activations to drive conversions and engagements
- Guided cross-functional departments and hands-on in digital campaigns
- Product owner of website and app: healthhub,sg, hpb.gov.sg. Oversaw UI/UX and development using AGILE methodology. Successful execution of media launch and marketing campaign (included ATL, BTL and online) to achieve user acquisition and mobile application downloads KPIs.
profile_positions.title: Department head | Senior Manager, Digital Marketing

profile_positions.description:
ESG is a leading sports and marketing agency based in Singapore. It is an associate of Kingsmen Creatives Ltd, a global SGX-listed communication design and production group. 

- Department Head; led partnership fulfillments and integrated marketing, customer engagement, branding and media relations, developed concepts and activation ideas and directed external agencies in creative production
- Managed external PR agency to garner media interest and coverage for events
- Developed branding, marketing concepts and activation ideas and directed external agencies in creative production for new pitches and existing events
- Managed budget of sports events worth over SGD 1 million
- Achieved registration and participant targets, ranging from 300 for corporate events to 10,000 for ticketed events
profile_positions.title: Department head | Senior Manager, Marketing & Client Services

profile_positions.description:
UOB is a market leader in the credit card and private residential home loan businesses. It is rated among the world’s top banks, with a rating of Aa1 from Moody’s and AA- from S&P’s respectively.

- Championed exclusive partnership with Marina Bay Sands. Managed overall budget, business relationship and joint marketing efforts
- Cultivated stakeholder relationships with dining establishments such as Les Amis, Millennium & Copthorne hotel group, developed and promoted card usage programmes and campaigns through offline (press ads, radio) and online marketing (database marketing, leads generation, microsites) to drive spend and brand positioning of UOB Cards as a top-of-wallet card
profile_positions.title: Assistant Vice President, Cards Marketing

profile_positions.description:
STB champions the development of tourism sector and undertakes the marketing and promotion of Singapore as a tourism destination.

- Spearheaded research, development and branding of Orchard Road which included enhancement of infrastructure, creation of signature events, local and regional marketing
- Drove strategic partnerships with global companies and merchants e.g. MasterCard, UnionPay, Global Blue, WingTai group, Club21, and government agencies
profile_positions.title: Manager, Tourism Shopping

profile_positions.description:
- Oversaw programming and branding of the annual Great Singapore Sale, conducted industry briefing and launch event to generate media buzz with annual international media value of SGD 2 Million
- Coordinated cross-functional teams and over 10 regional offices to market Singapore as a compelling shopping destination via media familiarisation trips, marketing campaigns, media relations, and exclusive tourist privileges
profile_positions.title: Management Executive, Tourism Shopping and Dining

profile_positions.description:
Shaw Towers Realty Pte Ltd was a property management firm managing a 35-storey commercial building with 26,000 sqm of office space and 10,000 sqm of retail service space.

- Developed office leasing and rental pricing strategies and successfully maintained office occupancy at 95%
- Oversaw retail mall operations, marketing communications and website, training program for retail tenants on best practices to improve their business operations 
- Managed promotional activities and customer loyalty programs to increase retail footfall
profile_positions.title: Assistant Centre Manager | Property Management | Marketing & Events
